ISSUE.TITLE: UPSTREAM_PROXY variable not used
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Sounds like UPSTREAM_PROXY variables are not used for : - check update - malware db update - virus total analysis is this intentional ? cheers Vince

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Superpoussin22 Python3 Upstream proxy (#554) Add Upstream Proxy to all networking call. Fixed https://github.com/MobSF/Mobile-Security-Framework-MobSF/issues/532
